summary: This is an email from a prosecutor to Audrey Strauss regarding a 'friendly subpoena' to attorney M to obtain a copy of the settlement agreement between a victim and Jeffrey Epstein from a 2009 civil suit. The document indicates the agreement is relevant to the investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's participation in abuse.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Recipient of the email; the prosecutor is communicating with her about obtaining a settlement agreement via subpoena for the Maxwell investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the ongoing investigation into her participation in the abuse of underage girls, including the victim associated with the settlement agreement.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in the 2009 civil suit which was resolved by the settlement agreement being sought.

connections.description: M possesses a copy of the settlement agreement that resolved a 2009 civil suit against Epstein.
The investigation is into Maxwell's participation in abuse with Epstein, as indicated by the relevance of the settlement agreement to that investigation.

events.title: Civil suit against Epstein settled
events.description: A civil suit was filed against Jeffrey Epstein and resolved via a settlement agreement.

events.title: Request for friendly subpoena
events.description: The Maxwell prosecution team requests to issue a 'friendly subpoena' to attorney M to obtain the 2009 Epstein settlement agreement.

keyFacts: A 2009 civil suit against Jeffrey Epstein was resolved by a settlement agreement.
Attorney M possesses a copy of this settlement agreement and is willing to provide it but believes he needs a subpoena.
The settlement agreement is considered relevant to the investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's participation in the abuse of underage girls.
The Maxwell prosecution team conducted interviews in Florida where they learned about the agreement.
This is a 'friendly subpoena' request, indicating cooperative but formal legal process.
